verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Though we may waver
He remaineth steadfast
All of His words are sure
From everlasting
Unto everlasting
His promises endure

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though we may wander
He will not forsake us
Truer than earthly friend
He never fails our trust
For having loved us
He loves unto the end

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Unto the end
We doubt Him
We deny Him
We wound Him
We forget
We get some earthly
idol up between us
Without one faint regret

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And when it falls or crumbles
And in anguish
We seek this
Changeless Friend
Lo He receives us
Comforts and forgives us
And loves us to the end
